cause.description:
**This Cause is Dedicated in Loving Memory of Jennifer Lynn Easton**
Wilms' tumor is a neoplasm of the kidneys that typically occurs in children. Wilms' tumor can affect any child regardless of race, sex, country of origin, or parental occupation. The disease is mostly noticed around age three.
1. All children should have an equal chance at a healthy beginning
cause.mission: help prolong the life of children affect by Wilms Tumor
cause.name: Find a Cure for Wilms' Tumor
